mapper.insert: insert into car_pattern(car_brand_id, car_pattern, time_pattern, pattern_key) values(#{carBrandId},#{carPattern},#{timePattern},#{patternKey})
mapper.select: select count(*) from car_pattern where car_brand_id=#{carBrandId} and car_pattern=#{carPattern} and time_pattern=#{timePattern} and pattern_key=#{patternKey} limit 1
select * from car_pattern where car_brand_id=#{carBrandId} limit #{defaultMaxCountLimit}
select * from car_pattern order by id limit #{startCount}, #{pageSize}
